item.description: Quick Meeting with Sammy 13:18 to 13:45 Registration is fully working with a database connected to it, we just don’t have the other pages.
Meeting with Sammy (and Zeeshan!) Attendants: Pietra Zeeshan Sammy 14:06 - 16:55 Key topics: Discussed our target audience.
Sprint Planning The What - the product owner describes the objective (goal) of the sprint and what backlog items contribute to that goals.
Marine Pollution Mostly comes from land sources, 80%. Two main types: chemicals and trash. Plastic is particularly problematic as a pollutant because it is very long-lasting.

item.title: Forum DevLog
item.description: Forum DevLog Achievements Initialised the project by creating the HTML and CSS pages. Added support to smaller screens.

item.title: Forum DevLog 23/02
item.description: Forum DevLog Today I’m working on continuing to develop the comment and reply system within the forum. Currently, the admin has to add comments and replies manually using the dashboard.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: The theme of the project will be based on the UN Sustainable Development Goals. It will be a full-stack web application with a server backend, pulling and pushing data from and to a data source.

item.title: REST API
item.description: REST API APIs provide a standardised way for two applications to send data back and forth. REST is a set of guidelines that software can use to communicate over the internet in order to make integrations simple and scalable.
